com.buyanova.service

Interface BetService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BetServiceImpl

    public interface BetService
    BetService interface is used to describe business logic concerning Bet entity.
    See Also:
    BetServiceImpl

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBet(Bet bet)
      Adds bet to the data source.
      Bet getBetById(int betId)
      Returns Bet object with the full information about the bet from the data source.
      java.util.List<Bet> getBetsByUser(User user)
      Returns list of bets made by specified user.
      void removeBet(Bet bet)
      Removes bet from the data source and returns money to its user.
      void updateBet(Bet bet)
      Update information about the specified bet in the data source.

    • Method Detail

      • addBet

        void addBet(Bet bet)
     throws ServiceException
        Adds bet to the data source.

        The method will execute successfully in case bet's sum is less than the user's balance, otherwise an exception is thrown.

        Amount of money equal to the bet's sum is automatically withdrawn from user's balance.

        Parameters:
        bet - bet that is to be added
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null bet is passed, if bet contains invalid fields, if a data source access error occurs

      • removeBet

        void removeBet(Bet bet)
        throws ServiceException
        Removes bet from the data source and returns money to its user.

        Note: it checks bet exists so that to prevent replenishment of user's balance.

        Parameters:
        bet - bet that is to be removed, should be present in the data source
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null or non-existent bet is passed or a data source access error occurs

      • updateBet

        void updateBet(Bet bet)
        throws ServiceException
        Update information about the specified bet in the data source.

        The method will execute successfully in case the difference between new bet's sum and the old one is less than the user's balance, otherwise an exception is thrown.

        Note: it checks bet exists so that to prevent updating user's balance.

        Parameters:
        bet - bet that is to be updated
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null or non-existent bet is passed, if bet contains invalid fields, if user doesn't have enough money to update bet, if a data source access error occurs

      • getBetsByUser

        java.util.List<Bet> getBetsByUser(User user)
                           throws ServiceException
        Returns list of bets made by specified user.
        Parameters:
        user - user whose bets are requested
        Returns:
        list of bets made by specified user
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null user is passed, or a data source access error occurs

      • getBetById

        Bet getBetById(int betId)
        throws ServiceException
        Returns Bet object with the full information about the bet from the data source.
        Parameters:
        betId - id of the requested bet
        Returns:
        bet with specified id
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if bet with such id doesn't exist, if a data source access error occurs
